Plot: Professional hit-man Charlie Wolfe finds himself in three tales of murder, blackmail and revenge after a botched contract assignment.
Title: Kill Me Three Times
Actors: Simon Pegg, Steve Le Marquand, Alice Braga, Teresa Palmer
tomatoConsensus: Kill Me Three Times offers Simon Pegg an opportunity to play against type as a villain; unfortunately, its derivative storyline fails to offer much of anything to viewers.
